.. _numerical_qm_woods_saxon:
===============================================
Numerical Solution for the Wood-Saxon Potential
===============================================

Given the `Woods-Saxon <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woods–Saxon_potential>`_,
solve the Schrodinger's equation and find the energy eigenvalues and eigenvectors.

`hint <https://physics.stackexchange.com/questions/170546/numerical-solution-to-schrödinger-equation-eigenvalues>`_
